titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: START DATE REQUESTED (NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE PREVIOUSLY UNASSESSED PERIOD OF CARE) - Description

div.p: START DATE REQUESTED (NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE PREVIOUSLY UNASSESSED PERIOD OF CARE) is the same as attribute ACTIVITY DATE where the ACTIVITY DATE TYPE is National Code 'Start Date' of the NHS Continuing Healthcare Previously Unassessed Period of Care that the Clinical Commissioning Group has been requested to review.
